text: Anata gata wa tsuma-tachi ni taishite kohei ni shiyou to shite mo, totei dekinaidearou. Anata gata wa (so) nozonde mo. Hen'ai ni katamuki, tsuma no hitori o aimai ni hanatte oite wa naranai. Anata gataga yuwa shi,-nushi o osoreru nonaraba. Makotoni arra wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okata, jihibukai okata de ara reru
